artist: Designer: William Morris; Publisher: Kelmscott Press, Hammersmith, England
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Solomom A. Smith II
description: Paper bifolium, Chaucer and Troy type, printed in red and black, woodcut borders bearing the arms of France, the Empire, England, Reginald Lord Cobham, Sir Walter Manny and Sir John Chandos.
medium: Letterpress in red and black with woodcut borders
provenance: Mr. and Mrs. Solomon A. Smith II; given to MIA, 1991.
title: Two trial pages of the projected edition of Lord Berner's Translation of Froissart's Chronicles
